frame.title: Jobs Without Autoscaling
frame.description: Jobs with static worker counts - consider enabling autoscaling

frame.title: Jobs Producing Stale Datasets
frame.description: Jobs producing tables that are never read downstream

frame.title: Jobs Using All-Purpose Clusters
frame.description: Jobs incorrectly running on interactive clusters

frame.title: Jobs with Cost Outliers
frame.description: Jobs with runs significantly exceeding P90 cost

datasets.name: ds_no_autoscale_count
datasets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT j.job_id) AS count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j WHERE j.is_current = TRUE AND j.cluster_spec IS NOT NULL

datasets.name: ds_stale_count
datasets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) AS count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_table_lineage WHERE event_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS AND target_table_full_name IS NOT NULL AND entity_type = 'JOB'

datasets.name: ds_ap_count
datasets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT j.job_id) AS count FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j WHERE j.is_current = TRUE

datasets.name: ds_no_autoscale
datasets.query: SELECT j.name AS job_name, w.workspace_name, COALESCE(j.max_concurrent_runs, 1) AS worker_count, ROUND(COALESCE(u.total_cost, 0), 2) AS cost_30d FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_workspace w ON j.workspace_id = w.workspace_id AND w.is_current = TRUE LEFT JOIN (SELECT usage_metadata_job_id AS job_id, SUM(list_cost) AS total_cost FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_usage WHERE usage_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS AND usage_metadata_job_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY usage_metadata_job_id) u ON j.job_id = u.job_id WHERE j.is_current = TRUE ORDER BY cost_30d DESC LIMIT 20

datasets.name: ds_stale_datasets
datasets.query: SELECT COALESCE(j.name, CONCAT('Job ', l.job_id)) AS job_name, COUNT(DISTINCT l.target_table_full_name) AS unused_tables, COUNT(DISTINCT l.event_date) AS runs_30d FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_table_lineage l LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j ON l.job_id = j.job_id AND l.workspace_id = j.workspace_id AND j.is_current = TRUE WHERE l.event_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS AND l.target_table_full_name IS NOT NULL AND l.entity_type = 'JOB' GROUP BY COALESCE(j.name, CONCAT('Job ', l.job_id)) ORDER BY runs_30d DESC LIMIT 20

datasets.name: ds_ap_jobs
datasets.query: SELECT j.name AS job_name, w.workspace_name, 'Interactive Cluster' AS cluster_name, COUNT(*) AS task_runs FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_job_run_timeline f LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j ON f.job_id = j.job_id AND f.workspace_id = j.workspace_id AND j.is_current = TRUE LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_workspace w ON f.workspace_id = w.workspace_id AND w.is_current = TRUE WHERE f.period_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS GROUP BY j.name, w.workspace_name ORDER BY task_runs DESC LIMIT 20

datasets.name: ds_outliers
datasets.query: WITH job_stats AS (SELECT j.name AS job_name, f.job_id, COUNT(*) AS runs, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, f.period_start_time, f.period_end_time)) AS avg_duration, PERCENTILE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, f.period_start_time, f.period_end_time), 0.9) AS p90_duration, MAX(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, f.period_start_time, f.period_end_time)) AS max_duration FROM ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.fact_job_run_timeline f LEFT JOIN ${catalog}.${gold_schema}.dim_job j ON f.job_id = j.job_id AND f.workspace_id = j.workspace_id AND j.is_current = TRUE WHERE f.period_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS AND f.result_state IS NOT NULL GROUP BY j.name, f.job_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5) SELECT job_name, runs, ROUND(avg_duration / 60, 1) AS avg_cost, ROUND(p90_duration / 60, 1) AS p90_cost, ROUND(max_duration / 60, 1) AS max_cost, ROUND((max_duration - p90_duration) / 60, 1) AS deviation FROM job_stats ORDER BY deviation DESC LIMIT 20
